timeline.message:
Merge pull request #1 from linkedin/master

Pull latest
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:linkedin/brooklin into HEAD

timeline.bodyText:
I think more context is necessary here for when _partitions vs. _partitionsV2 is used. Partition managed uses _partitionsV2 and puts in the full name of the Topic-Partition, due to which the log cannot be reduced in this way.
I'd also question whether we should avoid populating _partitionsV2 altogether for any tasks that are not Partition managed. This can be explored as part of another PR though (maybe open a ticket for this)
timeline.author: somandal

replies.bodyText: Added comments. Also created ticket to investigate.
replies.author: vmaheshw

timeline.bodyText: The format string is used in 3 places now. Create a local variable/member constant FORMAT_STRING?
timeline.author: somandal

replies.bodyText: Redid the logic. Format string is in 1 place now.
replies.author: vmaheshw

timeline.bodyText: Remove the return log from here. It's the same as the one outside the if() block. Let it drop into the return outside the if() block.
timeline.author: somandal

timeline.bodyText: can this check be (if (!StringUtils.isBlank(_partitionsV2)) since only v2 is being referenced within the conditional statement?
timeline.author: DEEPTHIKORAT

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the explanation. ParititonsV2 is topic-partitions or stringified partitions based on low-level or high-level tasks.
replies.author: DEEPTHIKORAT
